name: happyswing
description: A huge swing that generates music and light effects, depending on how crazy you swing.

name: Three Body Problem
description: A simulation of the three body problem to explore how different initial conditions and why it's differential equation is unsolveable.

name: Electric bobbycar
description: An electrically motorized bobbycar that drives 25km/h.

name: Screaming plant
description: A plant that screams when it needs to be watered.
